text: D.B. Gangodathenna (born May 28, 1943 as ඩී. බී. ගංගොඩතැන්නේ) [Sinhala]), is an actor in Sri Lankan cinema, stage drama and television. Gangodathenna act in supportive comedy roles particularly in cinema. ==Acting career== Gangodathenna started his film career with Mathu Yam Dawasa back in 2001, directed by Dharmasena Pathiraja. ===Notable television works=== * Deveni Athmaya * Dhawala Kadulla * Hatara Kenderaya * Kasee Salu * Kethumathi Neyo * Kinnara Damanaya * Manmaadhawee * Maya Ranaga * Sanda Dev Diyani ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" !
